overview: In London, 2044, the gap between rich and poor has been stretched to its limits. All forms of social housing have been eradicated and Londonâ€™s working classes have been forced to live in temporary accommodation on the outskirts of the city. We follow Izi, a resident of who is desperately trying to find a way out and 12-year-old, Benji, who has lost his mother and is searching for a family, as they battle to survive.
title: The Kitchen
